items.sentence: The most dangerous thing Tom ever tried to do was bungee jumping.

Tom didn\'t have time to watch the TV program he wanted to watch.
Tom didn\'t seem very interested in going to the concert with us.
I try to always be nice to Tom, even though he\'s not nice to me.
